"A.I.S. Vega Training":
"■Training Program
――――――――――――――――――――
Task 1: Shooting training
Task 2: Melee training
Task 3: Multi-Lock Missile training
Task 4: Counter Shield training
Task 4: Step Boost training
Task 6: Practical training"
"We will now start pilot training for the A.I.S. Vega, which was developed for space combat."
"Have you read the piloting manual? You can access it with that Message Pack, so be sure to read it!"

"During this training program, you'll be destroying virtual targets.
Training, begin!"
